title: Tofu chocolate ice cream

ingredients.content: 100 g dark chocolate (70% cocoa), broken into pieces

preparations.content: Place chocolate into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add oil, vanilla and milk and heat <b>5 min/90Â°C/speed 3<b> or until chocolate has melted.
Add tofu and blend <b>30 sec/speed 4<b> or until well combined. Transfer into a freezable storage container and place into freezer until frozen (approx. 6 hours or overnight).
Remove from freezer and cut into pieces (approx. 4 x 4 cm). Place ice cream into mixing bowl and crush <b>20 sec/speed 6<b>, then mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>, with aid of spatula.

Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and blend <b>1 min/speed 10<b>, until smooth and creamy. Serve immediately or transfer mixture back into freezable container and place into freezer until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: Ice cream can be stored in the freezer for up to 1 month.
You can use any kind of milk in this recipe. You may need to adjust the sweetness accordingly, as almond milk has a natural sweetness.
